Text: Looks good, pretty intuitive to install. To activate Office, I just clicked on the (first) "Activate Office 2010 VL" button, installed the KMS emulator as a Windows Service, and then clicked on it again to activate. Then I started Powerpoint for the first time (ever) and the updates seem to work. Caught by Microsoft Security Essentials as a keygen. Powerpoint reports as activated. Very nice.

Can you use this in a network or do you have to install it on every pc?
And what about servers? are those included?
